projects.title: My network
projects.bodyText:
- Centralize your business relationships for smarter, more agile, and stronger connections.
- Transform the way you manage your business ecosystem by centralizing **prospects**, **clients**, **partners**, and **vendors** into a dynamic, **data-driven** view.
- Gain deeper insights and make **strategic decisions** with ease.
 - **PROPERTY OF CHAINDOTS**

projects.title: StockPic
projects.bodyText:
- An inventory visualization tool that reads stock data from **Excel** or **Google Sheets** and updates corresponding product images with the available stock.
 - Automatically overlays stock numbers on images using **Python Pillow**.
 - Supports batch processing for multiple products and exports updated images to a designated folder.
 - Can be integrated into existing workflows for e-commerce or inventory management.

projects.title: Sales bot
projects.bodyText:
- A Telegram bot that **responds to user commands** and handles interactions seamlessly.
 - Integrated with a **payment gateway** to process transactions securely.
 - Supports automated responses, notifications, and custom workflows for enhanced user experience.

projects.title: Colppy + Hubspot + Powerbi integration
projects.bodyText:
- A workflow integration connecting **Colppy**, **HubSpot**, and **Power BI** to streamline data flow.
 - Automates extraction, transformation, and visualization of financial and CRM data.
 - Enables real-time dashboards and actionable insights for smarter business decisions.

projects.title: Music downloader
projects.bodyText:
- A web application to **download music from YouTube** quickly and efficiently.
 - Supports multiple formats and automatic conversion to **MP3**.
 - Provides a simple, user-friendly interface for seamless downloading.

projects.title: Url life checker
projects.bodyText:
- A web application to **monitor and verify the status** of any given URL.
 - Performs real-time checks and returns **HTTP status codes** with response details.
 - Useful for uptime monitoring, debugging, and ensuring service availability.

projects.title: ai-telegram-bot
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a **Telegram chatbot** for expense tracking with automatic categorization using **AI**.
- Built with two **Python services** working together to provide a seamless expense management experience.
- Enables users to log expenses in real time and receive smart insights for better financial management.

projects.title: social-media-api
projects.bodyText:
- Built a modern, scalable **social media API** using **Django REST Framework**.
- Designed following **SOLID principles** and implemented industry best practices for **enterprise-level applications**.
- Includes features such as authentication, user interactions, and optimized database queries to ensure performance and maintainability.
